title: The Bachelorette's Angie Kent kisses FIVE different men in new trailer
text:
She's set to date 20 eligible suitors on The Bachelorette.

And on Sunday, a raunchy trailer for the upcoming season confirmed that Angie Kent kisses at least five of her bachelors.

The steamiest moment came when the former Gogglebox star, 29, snogged long-haired hunk Timm Hanly, 27, in a swimming pool.

She's not holding back! On Sunday, a raunchy trailer for The Bachelorette confirmed that Angie Kent (right) kisses at least five of her contestants. Pictured with Timm Hanly (left)

Angie bit Timm's upper lip during their pool make out session.

'Fabulously British' Ciarran Stott, 25, also kissed Angie not once but twice in the extended trailer.

One of their trysts even took place during a cocktail party.

So nice, he kissed her twice! 'Fabulously British' Ciarran Stott (pictured) also kissed Angie not once but twice in the extended trailer

Controversial! One of their trysts even took place during a cocktail party

Angie kissed two other men in the trailer, but it's unclear who they were.

Her last kiss was with Instagram-famous rescue dog advocate Ryan Anderson, who is set to arrive later in the season as an 'intruder'.

In previous seasons of The Bachelorette, intruders have been kept under wraps until just before their arrival in the mansion.

Mystery men! Angie kissed two other men in the trailer, but it's unclear who they were

Latecomer: Her last kiss was with Instagram-famous rescue dog advocate Ryan Anderson (left), who is set to arrive later in the season as an 'intruder'

The rest of the trailer teased plenty of drama for the upcoming season, with Angie and three of her suitors breaking down in tears.

Ciarran labeled another contestant an 'absolute weasel', before Timm accused someone of calling Angie a 'b**ch' behind her back.

The Bachelorette premieres Wednesday at 7:30pm on Channel 10

Is everything okay? The rest of the trailer teased plenty of drama for the upcoming season, with Angie and three of her suitors breaking down in tears
description: She's set to date 20 eligible suitors on The Bachelorette.
authors: Shive Prema For Daily Mail Australia
